extensionDescription.message: A web extension that allows to find and download media files from web hosts.

optionsPage_useCacheOptionWarning_1.message: This option prevents a same file from being downloaded several times during a same session.

optionsPage_useCacheOptionWarning_2.message: Notice that if a file is explicitly requested to be downloaded once again, the cache will not apply.
